title: Vulgate - Genesis 1:1
text: in principio creavit deus caelum et terram et aquas dei
characteristics: Original manuscript, archaic language with divine terminology

title: Nova Vulgata - Genesis 1:1
text: in principio creavit deus caelum et terram
characteristics: Modern translation, follows shared/central text path

title: Vetus Latina - Genesis 1:1
text: initio fecit pater nostrum deus caelum et aquas dei
characteristics: Contemporary language with modern verb choices

title: Vetus Latina (African Text) - Genesis 1:1
text: in principio creavit dominus deus caelum et terram
characteristics: Contemporary language with modern verb choices

title: Medieval Manuscript Variant - Genesis 1:1
text: initio Deus fecit terram spiritus dominus caelum
characteristics: Contemporary language with modern verb choices

title: Clementine Vulgate - Genesis 1:1
text: in principio creavit Deus caelum et terram et erat terra inanis et vacua
